    • getDataFromDB

      public static void getDataFromDB(String persistenceUnitName, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Group> groupsData)
      Method which gets all groups from database and fills groupsData. Uses EntityManager to operate
      Parameters:
      persistenceUnitName - Name of persistence unit in persistence.xml file
      groupsData - Observable list which stores groups from database

    • selectDataFromDB

      public static void selectDataFromDB(String persistenceUnitName, String parameter, String value, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Group> resultData)
      Method used to select specific data from database(searching). Uses simple SELECT-WHERE SQL query. \ Uses switch-case logic to work with different parameters
      Parameters:
      persistenceUnitName - Name of persistence unit in persistence.xml file
      parameter - String that specifies parameter the parameter by which the search is performed
      value - Value of parameter
      resultData - Observable list that stores found groups
